definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳和肯得及就是利用这种国际化策略来盈利的。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, all I can afford today is a Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，今天我只吃得起一个大的麦当劳汉堡。

sentences.english: Now Alexander is going to reveal a secret of how to cook a sandwich from McDonald’s.
sentences.chinese: 现在亚历山大要揭密如何制作麦当劳三明治了。

sentences.english: And then we'll need to eat them PDQ, too!
sentences.chinese: 我们改去麦当劳吧，快餐店应该不会等太久。

sentences.english: But last year, McDonald's Premium coffee got some good press.
sentences.chinese: 但去年麦当劳贴水咖啡给予很好的压力。

sentences.english: Clever newspaper ad for new McDonald’s sandwich in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的瑞典麦当劳新款三明治报纸广告。

sentences.english: Being the first, McDonald's is getting a lot of notoriety.
sentences.chinese: 作为第一个吃螃蟹者，麦当劳赢得了许多眼球。

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以选五花肉或瘦肉，中国的汉堡不输麦当劳。

sentences.english: You may rind McDonald＇s, Kentucky Fried Chicken, hainburger shops everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你会在任何地方找到麦当劳，肯塔基炸鸡，汉堡包店。

sentences.english: Is the marble ball platform that MacDonald gives, which is annual?
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳送的弹珠台，是哪年的？

sentences.english: CHARLIE BELL became chief executive of McDonald\'s in April.
sentences.chinese: 查理贝尔于4月份成为了麦当劳的首席执行官。

sentences.english: Mc Donald's sell hamburgers-that great American fast food.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳卖的汉堡包是一顶呱呱的美国快餐。

sentences.english: McDonald's headquarters is in Oak Brook, Illinois。
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳的总部位于伊利诺斯州的橡树溪。

sentences.english: The Macdonalds finished supper at Macdonald's, then bowled at the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 麦可糖那一家在麦当劳吃过晚饭后去球馆打保龄。

sentences.english: But it tends to be much more like, you know, working at Starbucks or working at, maybe McDonalds.
sentences.chinese: 但是更多的还是这种，在星巴克或者麦当劳工作。

sentences.english: McDonald's happy meal with Spiderman action figure.
sentences.chinese: 一份有蜘蛛侠电影情节的麦当劳快乐套餐。
